channel.title: The 1560 Project
channel.description: A weekly film blog. A 10 year project.

item.title: W027: Dorothy Arzner
item.description: A quick look at The Bride Wore Red (1937), Dance Girl Dance (1940) and First Comes Courage (1943).

item.title: W026: John Carpenter
item.description: A quick look at Dark Star (1974), Assault on Precinct 13 (1976) and Eyes of Laura Mars (1978).

item.title: W025: With Music from Joan Baez
item.description: A quick look at Sacco e Vanzetti (1971), Joe Hill (1971) and Silent Running (1972).

item.title: W024: Starring Vincent Price
item.description: A quick look at House of Wax (1953), The Fly (1958) and House on Haunted Hill (1959).

item.title: W023: Birds
item.description: A quick look at The Birds (1963), Kes (1969) and Jonathan Livingston Seagull (1973).

item.title: W022: Hitchcock's Spies
item.description: A quick look at The Man Who Knew Too Much (1934), The 39 Steps (1935) and Secret Agent (1936).

item.title: W021: 3 Remaining Ozu in Colour
item.description: A quick look at Equinox Flower (1958), Late Autumn (1960) and The End of Summer (1961).

item.title: W020: More Yasujiro Ozu
item.description: A quick look at The Flavour of Green Tea Over Rice (1952), Floating Weeds (1959) and Good Morning (1959).

item.title: W019: Yasujiro Ozu
item.description: A quick look at Late Spring (1949), Tokyo Story (1953) and An Autumn Afternoon (1962).

item.title: W018: Starring Sissy Spacek
item.description: A quick look at Badlands (1973), 3 Women (1977) and Coal Miner's Daughter (1980).

item.title: W017: Lina Wertmüller
item.description: A quick look at The Seduction of Mimi (1972), Love & Anarchy (1973) and Seven Beauties (1975).

item.title: W016: Larisa Shepitko
item.description: A quick look at Wings (1966), You and Me (1971) and Ascent (1977).

item.title: W015: Věra Chytilová
item.description: A quick look at Something Different (1963), Daisies (1966) and Panelstory (1980).

item.title: W014: Tarkovsky
item.description: A quick look at Ivan's Childhood (1962), Andrei Rublev (1966) and Stalker (1979).

item.title: W013: Ernst Lubitsch
item.description: A quick look at Trouble in Paradise (1932), Ninotchka (1939) and The Shop Around the Corner (1940).

item.title: W012: Peter Sellers' Inspector Clouseau
item.description: A quick look at The Pink Panther (1963), A Shot in the Dark (1964) and The Return of the Pink Panther (1975).

item.title: W011: Chantal Akerman
item.description: A quick look at Je Tu Il Elle (1974), Jeanne Dielman, 23, quai du commerce, 1080 Bruxelles (1975) and Les Rendez-vous d'Anna (1978).

item.title: W010: Ralph Bakshi
item.description: A quick look at Heavy Traffic (1973), Wizards (1977) and The Lord of the Rings (1978).

item.title: W009: Agnès Varda
item.description: A quick look at La Pointe Courte (1955), Cléo from 5 to 7 (1962) and Le Bonheur (1965).

item.title: W008: Sergei Eisenstein
item.description: A quick look at Alexander Nevsky (1938), Ivan the Terrible Part 1 (1944) and Part 2 (1945).

item.title: W007: Youssef Chahine
item.description: A quick look at Cairo Station (1958), Saladin (1963) and Alexandria... Why? (1979).

item.title: W006: Courtroom Dramas
item.description: A quick look at Seven Angry Men (1957), Anatomy of a Murder (1959) and Kramer Vs. Kramer (1979).

item.title: W005: Post-War Brit-Crime
item.description: A quick look at It Always Rains on Sunday (1947), Brighton Rock (1948) and The Blue Lamp (1950).

item.title: W004: David Lean
item.description: A quick look at Great Expectations (1946), The Bridge on the River Kwai (1957) and Laurence of Arabia (1962).

item.title: W003: Akira Kurosawa
item.description: A quick look at Rashomon (1950), Seven Samurai (1954) and Yojimbo (1961).

item.title: W002: The Dollars Trilogy
item.description: A quick look at A Fistful of Dollars (1964), For a Few Dollars More (1965) and The Good, The Bad and the Ugly (1966).

item.title: W001: Costa-Gavras
item.description: A quick look at Z (1969), The Confession (1970) and State of Siege (1973).
